source $(cd -P -- "$(dirname -- "$0")" && pwd -P)/header.sh
if [ -d "${KYLIN_HOME}/spark" ] then echo "Spark binary exists." else echo "Downloading spark package..." spark_package_dir=/tmp/spark_package
rm -rf /tmp/spark_package mkdir -p -- "${spark_package_dir}" && cd -P -- "${spark_package_dir}"
spark_version="2.3.2"
echo "No binary file found, start to download package to ${spark_package_dir}" wget {{spark_download_base_url}}/spark-${spark_version}-bin-hadoop2.7.tgz || echo "Download spark failed"
tar -zxvf spark-${spark_version}-bin-hadoop2.7.tgz || { exit 1; } mv spark-${spark_version}-bin-hadoop2.7 spark
# Remove unused components in Spark rm -rf spark/lib/spark-examples-* rm -rf spark/examples rm -rf spark/data rm -rf spark/R
mv spark ${KYLIN_HOME} rm -rf ${spark_package_dir} fi
